languages.text: "Многие считают Футфол пиратским гнездом, но, поверьте, есть разница между организованной преступностью и бандами отморозков, которым нечего терять. На вас напали как раз последние. Анверы — сборище подонков, наплевавших на наши обычаи и иерархию. Даже их предводитель — скорее идеолог, заводила, кричащий "вперед, вперед!". Не командир. Когда-нибудь мы его отыщем и вздернем — вероятно, это остудит пыл последователей".

traits.locale_text: "Многие считают Футфол пиратским гнездом, но, поверьте, есть разница между организованной преступностью и бандами отморозков, которым нечего терять. На вас напали как раз последние. Анверы — сборище подонков, наплевавших на наши обычаи и иерархию. Они — животные, без организации и без доходов. Когда мы найдем и прикончим их вожака, они распадутся сами собой".

languages.text: "Many consider Footfall to be a pirate den, but believe me when I say that there is a difference between organised crime and gangs of thugs who have nothing to lose. You were attacked by the latter. The Anvers are a gang of punks who spit on our customs and hierarchy. Even their leader is more akin to an ideologue — a rabble-rouser who calls for people's heads. Not a commander. Sooner or later, we will find him and have him strung up — that will likely cool his followers' enthusiasm."
languages.original_text: "Многие считают Футфол пиратским гнездом, но, поверьте, есть разница между организованной преступностью и бандами отморозков, которым нечего терять. На вас напали как раз последние. Анверы — сборище подонков, наплевавших на наши обычаи и иерархию. Даже их предводитель — скорее идеолог, заводила, кричащий "вперед, вперед!". Не командир. Когда-нибудь мы его отыщем и вздернем — вероятно, это остудит пыл последователей".

traits.locale_text: "Many consider Footfall to be a pirate den, but believe me when I say that there is a difference between organized crime and gangs of thugs who have nothing to lose. You were attacked by the latter. The Anvers are a gang of punks who spit on our customs and hierarchy. Even their leader is more akin to an ideologue — a rabble-rouser who shouts, 'Go on! Go on!' Not a commander. Sooner or later, we will find him and have him strung up — that will likely cool his follower's fervour."

"Many consider Footfall to be a pirate den, but believe me when I say that there is a difference between organized crime and gangs of thugs who have nothing to lose. You were attacked by the latter. The Anvers are a congregation of punks who have spat on our customs and hierarchy. They're animals, with no organization and no profits. When we find and kill their ringleader, they will disperse on their own."

"Many consider Footfall to be a pirate den, but believe me when I say that there is a difference between organized crime and gangs of thugs who have nothing to lose. You were attacked by the latter. The Anvers are a gang of punks who spit on our customs and hierarchy. Even their leader is more akin to an ideologue — a rabble-rouser who shouts, 'Go on! Go on!' Not a commander. Sooner or later, we will find him and have him strung up — that will likely cool his follower's fervour."

"Many consider Footfall to be a pirate den, but believe me when I say that there is a difference between organized crime and gangs of thugs who have nothing to lose. You were attacked by the latter. The Anvers are a gang of punks who spit on our customs and hierarchy. They're animals with no organization and no revenue. When we find and kill their ringleader, they will disperse on their own."

"Many consider Footfall to be a pirate den, but believe me when I say that there is a difference between organized crime and gangs of thugs who have nothing to lose. You were attacked by the latter. The Anvers are a gang of punks who spit on our customs and hierarchy. Even their leader is more akin to an ideologue — a rabble-rouser who shouts, 'Go on! Go on!' Not a commander. Sooner or later, we will find him and have him strung up — that will likely cool his follower's fervour."

"Many consider Footfall to be a pirate den, but believe me when I say that there is a difference between organised crime and gangs of thugs who have nothing to lose. You were attacked by the latter. The Anvers are a gang of punks who spit on our customs and hierarchy. Even their leader is more akin to an ideologue — a rabble-rouser who calls for people's heads. Not a commander. Sooner or later, we will find him and have him strung up — that will likely cool his follower's enthusiasm."

languages.text: 「多くがフットフォールを海賊の巣窟と思っている。しかし私の言い分では、組織犯罪と、失うものが何もないならず者の寄せ集めとの間には違いがある、信じてほしい。君が襲われたのは後者だ。アンヴァースは、私たちの習慣やハイエラークに唾を吐くチンピラ集団。奴らのリーダーでさえどちらかといえば理想家に近い。人の首を持って来いと叫ぶような男であり、生粋の司令官ではない。遅かれ早かれ、ソイツを見つけ出して縛り首にするつもり…そうすれば金魚の糞の熱も冷めるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Many consider Footfall to be a pirate den, but believe me when I say that there is a difference between organised crime and gangs of thugs who have nothing to lose. You were attacked by the latter. The Anvers are a gang of punks who spit on our customs and hierarchy. Even their leader is more akin to an ideologue — a rabble-rouser who calls for people's heads. Not a commander. Sooner or later, we will find him and have him strung up — that will likely cool his followers' enthusiasm."

traits.locale_text: 「多くがフットフォールを海賊の巣窟と思っている。しかし私の言い分では、組織犯罪と、失うものが何もないならず者の寄せ集めとの間には違いがある、信じてほしい。君が襲われたのは後者だ。アンヴァースは、私たちの習慣やハイエラークに唾を吐くチンピラ集団。奴らのリーダーでさえどちらかといえば理想家に近い。”いけ！いけ！”と叫ぶ荒くれ者の起爆剤さ。司令塔ではない。遅かれ早かれ、ソイツを見つけ出して縛り首にするつもりだーーそうすれば金魚の糞の熱も冷めるだろう」

languages.text: “许多人认为落脚港是海盗的巢穴，但请相信我，有组织的犯罪团伙和毫无章法的暴徒之间是有区别的，袭击您的人正是那群无法无天的暴民。安维尔帮是一群小混混，对我们的习俗和等级制度嗤之以鼻。就连他们的领导人，也不太像合格的指挥官，更像是个空想家，或是只会让别人冲上去送命的煽动家。我们迟早会找到他，把他绞死。这应该会浇灭那些追随者的狂热信念。”
languages.original_text: "Many consider Footfall to be a pirate den, but believe me when I say that there is a difference between organised crime and gangs of thugs who have nothing to lose. You were attacked by the latter. The Anvers are a gang of punks who spit on our customs and hierarchy. Even their leader is more akin to an ideologue — a rabble-rouser who calls for people's heads. Not a commander. Sooner or later, we will find him and have him strung up — that will likely cool his followers' enthusiasm."

traits.locale_text: “许多人认为落脚港是海盗的巢穴，但请相信我，有组织的犯罪团伙和毫无章法的暴徒之间是有区别的，袭击您的人正是后者。安维尔帮是一群小混混，对我们的习俗和等级制度嗤之以鼻。就连他们的领导人，也不太像合格的指挥官，更像是个空想家，或是只会高喊着‘继续！动手！’的煽动家。我们迟早会找到他，把他绞死。这应该会浇灭那些追随者的狂热信念。”

languages.text: «Casi todo el mundo se piensa que Paso es una guarida de piratas, pero créame que hay una diferencia entre el crimen organizado y las bandas de matones que no tienen nada que perder. A usted le atacaron estos últimos. Los Anvers son una banda de gamberros que se mofan de nuestras costumbres y jerarquía. No hay más que ver a su líder, un propagandista que no deja de exigir las cabezas de la gente. No es ni comandante ni nada. Tarde o temprano lo encontraremos y lo colgaremos, lo que probablemente enfriará el entusiasmo de sus seguidores».
languages.original_text: "Many consider Footfall to be a pirate den, but believe me when I say that there is a difference between organised crime and gangs of thugs who have nothing to lose. You were attacked by the latter. The Anvers are a gang of punks who spit on our customs and hierarchy. Even their leader is more akin to an ideologue — a rabble-rouser who calls for people's heads. Not a commander. Sooner or later, we will find him and have him strung up — that will likely cool his followers' enthusiasm."

traits.locale_text: «Casi todo el mundo se piensa que Paso es una guarida de piratas, pero créame que hay una diferencia entre el crimen organizado y las bandas de matones que no tienen nada que perder. A usted le atacaron estos últimos. Los Anvers son una banda de gamberros que se mofan de nuestras costumbres y jerarquía. No hay más que ver a líder, un propagandista que no deja de gritar "¡Adelante, adelante!" sin ser él comandante ni nada. Tarde o temprano lo encontraremos y lo colgaremos, lo que probablemente enfriará el fervor de sus seguidores».

languages.text: « Pour beaucoup, Castel est un repaire de pirates, mais je vous assure qu'il y a une différence entre le crime organisé et des gangs de voyous qui n'ont plus rien à perdre. Dans votre cas, vous avez été victime de ce second groupe. Les Anver sont une bande de vauriens qui crachent sur nos coutumes et notre hiérarchie. Leur chef est d'ailleurs plus proche de l'idéologue ; c'est un agitateur qui se contente généralement d'aiguillonner ses comparses, pas un commandant. Un jour ou l'autre, nous finirons bien par l'attraper et le faire pendre, ce qui devrait calmer les ardeurs de ses petits suiveurs. »
languages.original_text: "Many consider Footfall to be a pirate den, but believe me when I say that there is a difference between organised crime and gangs of thugs who have nothing to lose. You were attacked by the latter. The Anvers are a gang of punks who spit on our customs and hierarchy. Even their leader is more akin to an ideologue — a rabble-rouser who calls for people's heads. Not a commander. Sooner or later, we will find him and have him strung up — that will likely cool his followers' enthusiasm."

traits.locale_text: « Pour beaucoup, Castel est un repaire de pirates, mais je vous assure qu'il y a une différence entre le crime organisé et des gangs de voyous qui n'ont plus rien à perdre. Dans votre cas, vous avez été victime de ce second groupe. Les Anver sont une bande de vauriens qui crachent sur nos coutumes et notre hiérarchie. Leur chef est d'ailleurs plus proche de l'idéologue ; c'est un agitateur qui se contente généralement d'aiguillonner ses comparses, pas un commandant. Un jour ou l'autre, nous finirons bien par l'attraper et le faire pendre, ce qui devrait calmer les ardeurs de ses petits suiveurs. »

languages.text: "Viele halten Footfall für ein Piratennest, aber glaubt mir, es gibt einen Unterschied zwischen organisiertem Verbrechen und Banden von Schlägern, die nichts zu verlieren haben. Ihr wurdet von Letzteren angegriffen. Die Anvers sind eine Bande von Strolchen, die auf unsere Sitten und Hierarchie spucken. Selbst ihr Anführer ist eher ein Ideologe – ein Aufwiegler, der die Köpfe gewisser Leute fordert. Kein Commander. Früher oder später werden wir ihn finden und aufknüpfen – das dürfte den Eifer seiner Anhänger bremsen."
languages.original_text: "Many consider Footfall to be a pirate den, but believe me when I say that there is a difference between organised crime and gangs of thugs who have nothing to lose. You were attacked by the latter. The Anvers are a gang of punks who spit on our customs and hierarchy. Even their leader is more akin to an ideologue — a rabble-rouser who calls for people's heads. Not a commander. Sooner or later, we will find him and have him strung up — that will likely cool his followers' enthusiasm."

traits.locale_text: "Viele halten Footfall für ein Piratennest, aber glaubt mir, es gibt einen Unterschied zwischen organisiertem Verbrechen und Banden von Schlägern, die nichts zu verlieren haben. Ihr wurdet von Letzteren angegriffen. Die Anvers sind eine Bande von Strolchen, die auf unsere Sitten und Hierarchie spucken. Selbst ihr Anführer ist eher ein Ideologe – ein Aufwiegler, der 'Weiter! Weiter!' schreit. Kein Commander. Früher oder später werden wir ihn finden und aufknüpfen – das dürfte den Eifer seiner Anhänger bremsen."

languages.text: "Pek çok kişi Binliman'ı bir korsan yuvası olarak görür ama inanın bana, organize suç ile kaybedecek hiçbir şeyi olmayan haydut çeteleri arasında fark vardır. Size saldıranlar ikinci gruptandı. Anverlar, geleneklerimize ve hiyerarşimize tüküren bir serseri çetesidir. Başları da bir önderden çok milleti galeyana getiren, kelle uçurma meraklısı bir hayalperest. Er geç onu bulup sallandıracağız. Böylece takipçilerinin şevki de mum gibi sönecek."
languages.original_text: "Many consider Footfall to be a pirate den, but believe me when I say that there is a difference between organised crime and gangs of thugs who have nothing to lose. You were attacked by the latter. The Anvers are a gang of punks who spit on our customs and hierarchy. Even their leader is more akin to an ideologue — a rabble-rouser who calls for people's heads. Not a commander. Sooner or later, we will find him and have him strung up — that will likely cool his followers' enthusiasm."

traits.locale_text: "Pek çok kişi Binliman'ı bir korsan yuvası olarak görür ama inanın bana, organize suç ile kaybedecek hiçbir şeyi olmayan haydut çeteleri arasında fark var. Size saldıranlar ikinci gruptandı. Anverlar, geleneklerimize ve hiyerarşimize leke süren bir serseri çetesidir. Liderleri bile keller uçsun diyen hayalperestin teki, bir önder değil. Er ya da geç onu bulup astığımızda muhtemelen takipçilerinin coşkusu dinecektir."
